mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post (post_title, post_content, member_id) values (#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select m.member_name, p.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_read_count, p.member_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date from tbl_member m join tbl_post p on m.id = p.member_id
